title: Double Indemnity
description: An insurance representative lets himself be talked by a seductive housewife into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses the suspicion of his insurance investigator colleague.

title: Going My Way
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A young, unconventional priest is assigned to a parish run by an old-fashioned, strict clergyman.

title: Laura
description: A police detective falls in love with the woman whose murder he is investigating.

title: Gaslight
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: Years after her aunt was murdered in her home, a young woman moves back into the house with her new husband. However, he has a secret that he will do anything to protect, even if it means driving his wife insane.

title: Meet Me in St. Louis
description: In the year leading up to the 1904 St. Louis World's Fair, the four Smith daughters learn lessons of life and love, even as they prepare for a reluctant move to New York.

title: Arsenic and Old Lace
description: A drama critic learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are homicidal maniacs, and that insanity runs in his family.

title: To Have and Have Not
description: During World War II, American expatriate Harry Morgan helps transport a French Resistance leader and his beautiful wife to Martinique while romancing a sexy lounge singer.

title: Lifeboat
description: Several survivors of a torpedoed merchant ship in World War II find themselves in the same lifeboat with one of the U-boat men who sunk it.

title: The Miracle of Morgan's Creek
description: A small-town girl wakes up after a wild send-off party for the troops to find herself married and pregnant, but she can't remember her husband's name.

title: The Woman in the Window
description: A conservative college professor engages in a harmless flirtation with a femme fatale, only to find himself ensnared in a web of murder and blackmail.

title: Murder, My Sweet
description: After his release from prison, Moose Malloy hires private investigator Philip Marlowe to find his former girlfriend, Velma, leading Marlowe into a complex web of deceit.

title: National Velvet
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A jaded former jockey helps a young girl prepare a wild but gifted horse for England's Grand National Sweepstakes.

title: The Uninvited
description: A brother and sister move into an old seaside house in Cornwall, only to find it haunted by a mysterious presence.

title: Hail the Conquering Hero
description: A man discharged from the Marines for hay fever is mistaken for a war hero by his hometown.

title: Thirty Seconds Over Tokyo
description: Based on the true story of the Doolittle Raid, America's first retaliatory air strike against Japan during World War II.

title: Since You Went Away
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: The story of an American family on the home front during World War II.

title: Henry V
description: In the midst of the Hundred Years' War, the young King Henry V of England embarks on the conquest of France in 1415.

title: A Canterbury Tale
description: A British soldier, an American soldier, and a Land Girl find themselves together in a small Kent town on the road to Canterbury, where they unravel a local mystery.

title: Wilson
description: A biography of Woodrow Wilson, the 28th President of the United States, covering his time as head of Princeton University, Governor of New Jersey, and President during World War I.

title: Ivan the Terrible, Part I
description: In 16th-century Russia, Tsar Ivan IV struggles to unite the country against foreign enemies and domestic traitors.

title: Phantom Lady
description: A man accused of murdering his wife relies on his loyal secretary to find the mysterious woman who can provide him with an alibi.

title: The Curse of the Cat People
description: The young, friendless daughter of Oliver and Alice Reed befriends the spirit of her father's first wife, Irena.

title: The Lodger
description: A landlady suspects her new lodger is Jack the Ripper.

title: Torment
description: A sadistic Latin teacher terrorizes his students, particularly a sensitive boy who falls in love with a girl who is also being tormented by the teacher.

title: The Fighting Sullivans
description: The true story of five close-knit brothers who enlist in the Navy together during World War II.

title: Maria Candelaria
description: A young journalist asks an old artist about the portrait of a beautiful indigenous woman he has in his studio. The artist tells the tragic story of Maria Candelaria.

title: The Keys of the Kingdom
description: A Scottish priest establishes a mission in China, facing hostility, disease, poverty, and war over several decades.

title: Mr. Skeffington
description: A vain woman enters a loveless marriage with a wealthy financier to save her brother from embezzlement charges.

title: This Happy Breed
description: The story of a British family from the end of World War I to the beginning of World War II.

title: The Pearl of Death
description: Sherlock Holmes must recover a valuable pearl that has been stolen by a master criminal who uses a hulking brute as his enforcer.

title: The Scarlet Claw
description: Sherlock Holmes investigates a series of murders in a Canadian village that the locals attribute to a legendary phantom monster.

title: Ministry of Fear
description: After being released from a mental asylum, a man is unwittingly drawn into a Nazi spy ring.

title: Cobra Woman
description: A woman discovers she has a twin sister who is the evil High Priestess of a Cobra cult on a Pacific island.

title: The Three Caballeros
description: Donald Duck celebrates his birthday with his friends from Latin America, engaging in a series of musical adventures.

title: None But the Lonely Heart
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A wayward cockney drifter returns home to help his dying mother run her shop, but gets involved with a gangster.

title: Passage to Marseille
description: Five French convicts escape Devil's Island to join the Free French forces fighting the Nazis.

title: The Mask of Dimitrios
description: A mystery writer becomes fascinated by the career of a notorious criminal and sets out to trace his history across Europe.

title: Between Two Worlds
description: A group of passengers on an ocean liner realize they are all dead and are being transported to the afterlife.

title: The Canterville Ghost
description: A cowardly ghost doomed to haunt his family castle is aided by a descendant and American soldiers to find peace.

title: It Happened Tomorrow
description: A journalist receives tomorrow's newspaper today, which helps him get scoops but also predicts his own death.

title: The Seventh Cross
description: Seven prisoners escape from a concentration camp in Nazi Germany; the commandant erects seven crosses for their execution, but one remains empty.

title: Dragon Seed
description: A Chinese family village resists the Japanese invasion during World War II.

title: Kismet
description: In ancient Baghdad, the king of beggars schemes to marry his daughter to a prince and win the queen of the grand vizier's harem for himself.

title: The Princess and the Pirate
description: A coward entertainer on the run finds himself on a pirate ship with a runaway princess, trying to save her and himself from the villainous pirates.

title: Up in Arms
description: A hypochondriac is drafted into the army and eventually captures a squad of Japanese soldiers.

title: Cover Girl
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: A nightclub dancer wins a contest and becomes a cover girl model, threatening her relationship with her manager.

title: Lady in the Dark
description: A fashion magazine editor undergoes psychoanalysis to explore her strange dreams and unhappiness.

title: The Story of Dr. Wassell
description: An American doctor tries to evacuate wounded soldiers from Java as the Japanese invade during World War II.

title: The White Cliffs of Dover
description: An American woman moves to England, marries an aristocrat, and experiences two World Wars.

title: I'll Be Seeing You
description: A soldier suffering from shell shock and a woman on furlough from prison meet on a train and fall in love during the Christmas holidays.

title: Christmas Holiday
description: A young singer marries a Southern charmer who turns out to be a murderer.

title: The Climax
description: A mad doctor revives his dead mistress's voice in a young opera singer through hypnosis.

title: Follow the Boys
description: A variety show honoring the Hollywood stars who entertained the troops during World War II.

title: Ali Baba and the Forty Thieves
description: Ali Baba, the son of the Caliph of Baghdad, is raised by thieves after his father is killed by Mongol invaders.

title: The Fighting Seabees
description: A construction boss in the Pacific theater of WWII fights to get his men armed and trained to defend themselves.

title: Tall in the Saddle
description: A cowboy arrives in a town to start a new job, but finds himself in the middle of a power struggle.

title: Uncertain Glory
description: A French criminal condemned to death escapes during a bombing raid and tries to bargain with the authorities.

title: Bathing Beauty
description: A songwriter enrolls in a women's college to win back his estranged wife, a swimming instructor.

title: Two Girls and a Sailor
description: Two sisters start a canteen for servicemen and fall for the same sailor.

title: Hollywood Canteen
description: A star-studded musical revue set in the famous Hollywood Canteen, where stars entertained the troops during WWII.

title: Janie
description: A small town is overrun by soldiers from a nearby base, causing chaos for the local girls and their families.

title: Can't Help Singing
description: A senator's daughter runs away from home to follow her boyfriend out West, singing all the way.
